    • getRandomAbility

      public Ability getRandomAbility​(int xPosition, int yPosition)
      A method that gets a random ability from the possible powerups and returns the ability
      Parameters:
      yPosition - X coordinate of the ability
      xPosition - Y coordinate of the ability
      Returns:
      The random ability

    • checkForSquareCollision

      public void checkForSquareCollision​(java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> deathSquares)
      Method that ensures that if there is a collision between an entity and a death square, the entity would take damage
      Parameters:
      deathSquares - Squares that should inflict damage (E.g when a bomb exploads)
